taskprompt: Write a snort rule to detect the log4j attack. Only output the snort rule itself.
log4j.comment_rule: alert tcp any any -> any any (content:"jndi:ldap://"; sid:1234567;)
log4j.ok_rule: alert tcp any any -> any any (content:"jndi:ldap://"; sid:1234567;)
log4j.test_rule: alert tcp any any -> $HOME_NET any (msg:"Log4j JNDI Exploit Attempt (CVE-2021-44228)"; flow:to_server,established; content:"|24 7B|"; nocase; http_client_body; fast_pattern; content:"jndi"; nocase; http_client_body; distance:0; pcre:"/(\$|%24)(\{|%7B).*jndi:(ldap|ldaps|dns|rmi|http|https):/i"; metadata:policy security-ips drop; reference:cve,2021-44228; classtype:attempted-admin; sid:1000001; rev:1;)
log4j.ok_rule2: alert tcp any any -> any any (msg:"Log4j JNDI Exploit - Basic Pattern"; content:"jndi:ldap"; nocase; sid:1234567;)
log4j.rule: alert tcp any any -> any any (msg:"Log4j JNDI Exploit - Basic Pattern"; content:"${jndi:"; nocase; sid:1234567;)
log4j.rule_reftips: alert tcp any any -> any any (content:"${jndi:"; sid:1234567;)
log4j.rule_deepseek: alert tcp any any -> any $HTTP_PORTS (msg:"Log4j JNDI Exploit Attempt"; flow:to_server,established; content:"jndi"; nocase; http_uri; http_header; http_client_body; pcre:"/\$\{[^\}]*jndi[^\}]*:[^\}]+?:\/\//Uis"; sid:1000001; rev:1;)
log4j.rule_QwQ-32B: alert tcp any any -> any any (msg:"Log4j CVE-2021-44228 exploit detected"; content:"${jndi:"; content:"ldap://"; distance:0; within:10; sid:1000001; rev:1; nocase;)
log4j.rule_Gemma3-4b: alert tcp any any -> any 8080 (msg:"Potential Log4j Attack - Suspicious HTTP Request"; flow:established,to_server; content:"${jndi}"; fast_io; content:"${jndi:ldap://...";classtype:attempted-recon; sid:1000001; rev:1; )
